title: Zapata's
typeOfFood: Lacto, Beer/Wine, Mexican, Latin American, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. This Mexican restaurant and bar in Perth marks the vegetarian dishes and offers a vegan nacho and a Mexican drink with almond milk. Staff will accommodate requests to make a dish vegan by omitting sour cream and cheese. Half price nachos and tacos on Mondays and Tuesdays among other specials.
